title: Void Bag
summaries: The Void Bag is a portable storage item that grants the player access to the Void Vault at anywhere. Pressing âš· Open / Activate on the Void Bag item in the inventory will toggle it between "opened" Void Bag and Closed Void Bag. When used, it will provide a temporary portal, providing access to the player's Void Vault that lasts for 3 minutes. The item is not consumed and can be used limitlessly.

When opened, the Void Vault storage will effectively act as the player's secondary inventory, which automatically stores items collected after the player's main inventory is full, indicated by purple pickup text. Additionally, it also allows the player to interact with the items inside it as if they were in the main inventory without opening the Void Vault storage interface.

When closed, the Void Bag functions similarly to the Money Trough, only acting as a regular portable storage item. This will prevent it from picking up items when the player has a full inventory, and it loses the function of the secondary inventory.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons the void vault
Functions as an extended inventory when open
May pick up overflowing items when open
Right click to close
'This pocket dimension is out of this world!'
statistics.Sell: 2
